Description:
Model
Brand: Corsair
Name: SCIMITAR PRO RGB
Model: CH-9304311-NA


Details
Type: Wired
Interface: USB 2.0 Type-A
Tracking Method: Optical
Maximum dpi: 16000 dpi
Buttons: 17
Scrolling Capability: 1 x Wheel
Color: Black


Features
Features: 17 Fully Programmable Buttons: Ideal for performing frequent actions and executing complex macros in MMOs and MOBAs.

Unique Key Slider Control System: Reposition the 12 side buttons to comfortably fit your grip.

Native 16,000 DPI Optical Sensor: Equipped with a custom Pixart PMW3367 sensor, adjustable in 1 DPI resolution steps, for highly accurate and customizable tracking.

Dynamic Four-Zone RGB Backlighting: Near limitless customization of colors and effects.

Mechanical Side Switches: All 12 side buttons use mechanical switches designed to pro player specifications, providing tactile feedback and precise actuation.

Powerful CORSAIR iCUE Software: Enables RGB lighting control, sophisticated macro programming and button remaps, sensitivity customization, surface calibration, and more.

Durable Braided Cable: Stands up to the wear-and-tear of long gaming sessions.

Onboard Profile Storage: Take your macros and lighting profiles with you anywhere you go.

Surface Calibration Utility: Maximizes precision and responsiveness based on your mouse pad or surface.


Package Contents
Package Contents: SCIMITAR PRO RGB Gaming Mouse, Allen key, Quick start guide, Warranty Card
Label: Mouse Corsair Scimitar RGB Elite Black
